original_text: So you must all get up early tomorrow morning. As soon as there is light at dawn, you must leave with the men who came with you.’ So you must all get up early tomorrow morning. As soon as there is light at dawn, you must leave with the men who came with you.’
korean_text: 그런즉 너는 너와 함께 온 네 주의 신하들과 더불어 새벽에 일어나라 너희는 새벽에 일어나서 밝거든 곧 떠나라 하니라

sentences.original_text: So you must all get up early
As soon as there is light at dawn
with the men who came with you
